title: Video-Based Self-Directed Learning Program for English and Digital Literacy Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and fundamental smartphone operation proficiency
context.additional_context: Practical science education program for general citizens. Participants primarily access content via smartphones, with collaborative learning emphasized through in-class group activities

learning_goals: Learners can produce a 3-minute simple video presentation using English video content related to scientific topics
Learners can effectively organize audiovisual materials using digital tools (e.g., smartphone editing apps) during video production
Learners can analyze learning outcomes through peer and self-assessment and suggest at least three improvement directions

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
